pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Media is hurting our Country with its fraudulent and highly inaccurate coverage of Iran. It is scattershot, poorly sourced (made up), and DANGEROUS. At least Iran doesn't know what to think, which at this point may very well be a good thing!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump yet again refers to unflattering reporting as "fake news." Mainstream news organizations do not make up sources. That is a firing offense.
